title: Developmental Origins of the Brain-Gut-Microbiota System

questions.question: When does the development of the brain-gut-microbiota axis begin?

choices: Vaginally born infants have more skin bacteria

questions.question: What is a potential long-term consequence of disruptions in the early-life brain-gut-microbiota system?

questions.question: What role does maternal stress play in the development of the fetal brain-gut-microbiota axis?

questions.question: Which of the following is a strategy to promote breastfeeding in Timor-Leste?

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the concept of 'vertical transmission' in the context of the maternal microbiome?

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the relationship between maternal diet during pregnancy and fetal gut colonization?

questions.question: What is the potential impact of maternal malnutrition in Timor-Leste on infant brain-gut-microbiota axis development?
